column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Angell - Thank you for your review. I appreciate your kind words
column2: though I would like to ask if you could expound on what it was about our ramen that you found "just mediocre." Was there anything in particular you didn't like? Any and all feedback is invaluable to us as it helps us improve our station. Thank you again
column3: and I hope to hear from you.
